colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @022A *, ,CES PA 'DI NI CH'ING GIR LHA'I CHIGS SU 'KHRUNGS PA'I CANG CUNG GUNG GI SRAS BLO DANG BRTZON PAR LDAN PA DZA SAG BLA MA MA H'A B'A LA BHADRAS DNGUL GYI 'KHOR LO LHA RDZAS SRING DU RING BA DANG BCAS PAS JI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES NAN TAN GYIS BSKUL BA BZHIN, ^SKYABS MGON RDO RJE 'CHANG RJE BTZUN DAM PA LNGA BA CHEN PO DANG, ^RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO DKA' CHEN YE SHES CHOS 'PHEL DPAL BZANG PO DANG, ^RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO DKA' CHEN MKHAN PO RIN PO CHE BLO BZANG GA-YUNG DRUNG DPAL BZANG PO DANG, ^YONGS 'DZIN RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO DAM TSIG RDO RJE GRAGS PA DPAL BZANG PO DANG, ^RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO CHOS MDZAD BLO BZANG BSTAN PAR BRGYAS SGRON ME DPAL BZANG PO @022B SOGS SANGS RGYAS DNGOS KYI BLA MA BCU LHAG GI ZHABS RDUL LA SPYI BOS RIG PA'I SKAL PA THOB PA, ^BTZUN GZUGS 'CHANG BA'I DON GRUB RDO RJES, SNGON CHAD 'JI PA'I 'KHRI DANG MIGS GSAL BAR BSHAD PA MA MTHONG KYANG, NOR SKYONG RGAN POS CHU KLUNG BRGAL BA'I TSUL DU BRIS PA'I YI GE PA NI DPYOD LDAN SPOS 'DZIN PA DGE SLONG SBYIN PA DKON MCHOG GO, 'DIS KYANG BSTAN DANG 'GRO BA KUN LA PHAN THOGS PAR SHOG , ,,
